## IStringValueTypings.exportAsDefault property

Options for default exports. Note that options provided here will override options provided in [IStringValuesTypingsGeneratorBaseOptions.exportAsDefault](./typings-generator.istringvaluestypingsgeneratorbaseoptions.exportasdefault.md)<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
exportAsDefault?: boolean | IExportAsDefaultOptions;
```
